name: Republique
description: Beautiful French bistro with an iconic pastry case. Perfect for brunch or dinner. Don't miss the croissants!
address: 624 S La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90036

name: Guelaguetza
description: Authentic Oaxacan cuisine with incredible mole. A Koreatown institution that's worth the trip.
address: 3014 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90006

name: n/naka
description: Two-Michelin-star kaiseki experience. Reservations required months in advance. Worth every penny.
address: 3455 S Overland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90034

name: Bestia
description: Industrial-chic Arts District gem. House-made charcuterie and pizza are must-tries. Book ahead!
address: 2121 E 7th Pl, Los Angeles, CA 90021

name: Jitlada
description: Legendary Thai Town spot with Southern Thai specialties. Spice levels are no joke. Cash only!
address: 5233 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90027

name: Sqirl
description: Instagram-famous brunch spot. House-made jams and creative seasonal dishes. Expect a wait!
address: 720 N Virgil Ave #4, Los Angeles, CA 90029

name: Guerrilla Tacos
description: Elevated taco truck turned brick-and-mortar. Creative takes on Mexican cuisine in Arts District.
address: 2000 E 7th St, Los Angeles, CA 90021

name: HomeState
description: Texas-style breakfast tacos and queso. Multiple locations but Los Feliz is our favorite.
address: 4624 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90027

name: Blue Bottle Coffee - Arts District
description: Sleek cafe with expertly crafted coffee. Great spot for laptop work or people watching.
address: 582 Mateo St, Los Angeles, CA 90013

name: Intelligentsia Coffee - Silver Lake
description: Hip coffee roaster with excellent pour-overs. The patio is perfect for sunny LA mornings.
address: 3922 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90029

name: Verve Coffee Roasters
description: Santa Cruz-based roaster with beautiful Venice Beach location. Amazing cortados.
address: 1811 S Pacific Ave, Venice, CA 90291

name: The Virgil
description: Intimate Silver Lake bar with live music and DJs. Great cocktails and chill vibe.
address: 4519 Santa Monica Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90029

name: Bar Bandini
description: Beautiful rooftop bar in Echo Park. Perfect for sunset drinks and Italian-inspired snacks.
address: 2281 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90026

name: The Normandie Club
description: Sophisticated cocktail bar in Koreatown. Dark, moody atmosphere with expertly crafted drinks.
address: 3022 W 6th St, Los Angeles, CA 90020

name: Potted
description: Gorgeous plant shop and pottery studio. Unique selection of cacti, succulents, and tropical plants.
address: 3158 Los Feliz Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90039

name: The Sill
description: Modern plant shop with beginner-friendly options. Great for first-time plant parents.
address: 1502 Abbot Kinney Blvd, Venice, CA 90291

name: Rolling Greens
description: Gorgeous nursery and home goods shop. Amazing selection of outdoor plants and garden decor.
address: 9528 Jefferson Blvd, Culver City, CA 90232

name: Amoeba Music
description: Legendary independent record store. Massive vinyl selection spanning all genres. A must-visit.
address: 6200 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028

name: Permanent Records
description: Curated vinyl shop in Echo Park. Great for discovering indie, punk, and experimental music.
address: 1906 Cypress Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90065

name: Vacation Vinyl
description: Small but perfectly curated shop. Specializes in soul, funk, and rare grooves.
address: 3815 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90026
